section.title: Highlights
section.para: In addition to numerous new and upgraded packages, this release has the following highlights:

section.title: New Services
section.para: The following new services were added since the last release:

listitem.para: The documentation module gained an option named documentation.nixos.includeAllModules which makes the generated configuration.nix 5 manual page include all options from all NixOS modules included in a given configuration.nix configuration file. Currently, it is set to false by default as enabling it frequently prevents evaluation. But the plan is to eventually have it set to true by default. Please set it to true now in your configuration.nix and fix all the bugs it uncovers.
